name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Fusion of Genres and Global Talent**

Rock Werchter 2026 promises a dynamic lineup of 29 artists spanning a wide array of genres, with a strong focus on Indie Rock (6 acts), Alternative Rock (5 acts), and Alternative (4 acts). The festival also embraces diversity in sound, featuring everything from Electronic and Pop to Soul and Folk Rock, reflecting a rich tapestry of musical styles. With an average rating of 7.76 based on 100% of the artists rated, the event is set to deliver a high-quality experience for attendees.

The artist roster brings together talent from across the globe, with the majority hailing from the USA (12) and the UK (11), alongside notable contributions from Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia. While the lineup is predominantly male (22 artists), there is some representation from female (3), non-binary (1), and mixed-gender (2) acts. However, diversity in terms of people of color (POC) remains limited, with only 2 artists identified as POC.

Rock Werchter 2026 continues its tradition of blending established names with fresh, genre-defying talent, ensuring a memorable festival experience. With all acts linked on Spotify, fans can easily explore the lineup and get hyped for a weekend of eclectic music and vibrant performances.
